title: Bought RP from amazon, put in code, already redeemed
body: I put in the code and it says it was already redeemed but nothing was credited to my account, help?

replies.body: Hmmmm if the code said it had already been redeemed I'm wondering if someone had accidentally sold you a previously used code. Be sure to check back up on your ticket so our billing agents can get this sorted out for you!!

No? Why would you ever by RP from somewhere else other than the Riot shop? Someone correct me if im wrong but afaik you cant buy RP anywhere else. With the 0 information you gave it is most reasonable to assume you bought into a scam. Maybe you can try the Amazon support otherwise it's a good lesson learned.

Actually buying RP from Amazon is legit, so long as it is supplied by Amazon Digital Services. I've never had a problem doing so. You can also buy Riot Points from Gamestop (Physical card not digital.) 

I would get in contact with Riot Support by submitting a ticket and asking them to take a look. Otherwise, if you think you were scammed by some third party seller in Amazon, contact Amazon's support.
I definitely bought through riot on amazon, I've done this 15+ times and already worked, I submitted a ticket, just not sure exactly what information to provide but I'm sure they'll let me know.
